var render = function render() {
  var _vm = this,
    _c = _vm._self._c
  return _c(
    "v-form",
    { ref: "form" },
    [
      _c(
        "v-dialog",
        {
          attrs: { persistent: "", width: _vm.width },
          model: {
            value: _vm.show,
            callback: function ($$v) {
              _vm.show = $$v
            },
            expression: "show",
          },
        },
        [
          _c(
            "v-card",
            [
              _c("v-card-title", [
                _vm._v(" Select Country / Channel combinations "),
              ]),
              _c(
                "v-card-text",
                [
                  _c(
                    "v-sheet",
                    {
                      staticClass: "mb-3 black elevation-2",
                      attrs: { outlined: "" },
                    },
                    [
                      _c("v-data-table", {
                        staticClass: "pb-3",
                        attrs: {
                          headers: _vm.tableHeaders,
                          items: _vm.tableItems,
                          "hide-default-footer": "",
                        },
                        scopedSlots: _vm._u([
                          {
                            key: "body",
                            fn: function ({ items, headers }) {
                              return [
                                _c(
                                  "tbody",
                                  [
                                    _c(
                                      "tr",
                                      [
                                        _vm._l(headers, function (header) {
                                          return [
                                            header.value.substring(0, 6) ===
                                              "budget" &&
                                            header.value.substring(0, 7) !=
                                              "checked"
                                              ? _c(
                                                  "td",
                                                  [
                                                    _c("v-text-field", {
                                                      staticClass:
                                                        "shrink rounded-0",
                                                      attrs: {
                                                        label: "Country Budget",
                                                        type: "number",
                                                        dense: "",
                                                        "hide-details": "",
                                                        outlined: "",
                                                      },
                                                    }),
                                                  ],
                                                  1
                                                )
                                              : _c("td"),
                                            header.value.substring(0, 6) !=
                                              "budget" &&
                                            header.value.substring(0, 7) ===
                                              "checked"
                                              ? _c("td", [
                                                  _vm._v(
                                                    " " +
                                                      _vm._s(header.text) +
                                                      " "
                                                  ),
                                                ])
                                              : _vm._e(),
                                            header.value.substring(0, 6) !=
                                              "budget" &&
                                            header.value.substring(0, 7) !=
                                              "checked"
                                              ? _c("td")
                                              : _vm._e(),
                                          ]
                                        }),
                                      ],
                                      2
                                    ),
                                    _vm._l(items, function (item, itemIndex) {
                                      return _c(
                                        "tr",
                                        { key: itemIndex },
                                        [
                                          _c("td", [
                                            _vm._v(
                                              " " +
                                                _vm._s(item.channelCode) +
                                                " "
                                            ),
                                          ]),
                                          _vm._l(
                                            _vm.tableItemLabels,
                                            function (labels, labelIndex) {
                                              return [
                                                _c(
                                                  "td",
                                                  [
                                                    _c("v-checkbox", {
                                                      attrs: {
                                                        color: "secondary",
                                                        dense: "",
                                                        "hide-details": "",
                                                      },
                                                      on: {
                                                        change: function (
                                                          $event
                                                        ) {
                                                          return _vm.checkBoxChange(
                                                            item,
                                                            labels,
                                                            labelIndex,
                                                            itemIndex
                                                          )
                                                        },
                                                      },
                                                      model: {
                                                        value:
                                                          item[labels.checked],
                                                        callback: function (
                                                          $$v
                                                        ) {
                                                          _vm.$set(
                                                            item,
                                                            labels.checked,
                                                            $$v
                                                          )
                                                        },
                                                        expression:
                                                          "item[labels.checked]",
                                                      },
                                                    }),
                                                  ],
                                                  1
                                                ),
                                                _c(
                                                  "td",
                                                  [
                                                    _c("v-text-field", {
                                                      staticClass:
                                                        "shrink rounded-0",
                                                      attrs: {
                                                        disabled:
                                                          !item[labels.checked],
                                                        label:
                                                          "Country / Channel Budget",
                                                        type: "number",
                                                        dense: "",
                                                        "hide-details": "",
                                                        outlined: "",
                                                      },
                                                      on: {
                                                        input: function (
                                                          $event
                                                        ) {
                                                          return _vm.budgetFieldChange(
                                                            item,
                                                            labelIndex,
                                                            $event
                                                          )
                                                        },
                                                      },
                                                      model: {
                                                        value:
                                                          item[labels.budget],
                                                        callback: function (
                                                          $$v
                                                        ) {
                                                          _vm.$set(
                                                            item,
                                                            labels.budget,
                                                            $$v
                                                          )
                                                        },
                                                        expression:
                                                          "item[labels.budget]",
                                                      },
                                                    }),
                                                  ],
                                                  1
                                                ),
                                              ]
                                            }
                                          ),
                                        ],
                                        2
                                      )
                                    }),
                                  ],
                                  2
                                ),
                              ]
                            },
                          },
                        ]),
                      }),
                    ],
                    1
                  ),
                ],
                1
              ),
              _c(
                "v-card-actions",
                [
                  _c("v-spacer"),
                  _c(
                    "v-btn",
                    {
                      staticClass:
                        "grey lighten-1 mr-3 rounded-0 text-capitalize",
                      attrs: { light: "", depressed: "" },
                      on: {
                        click: function ($event) {
                          _vm.show = false
                        },
                      },
                    },
                    [_vm._v(" Cancel ")]
                  ),
                  _c(
                    "v-btn",
                    {
                      staticClass: "mr-3 success rounded-0 text-capitalize",
                      attrs: { depressed: "" },
                      on: { click: _vm.save },
                    },
                    [_vm._v(" Save ")]
                  ),
                ],
                1
              ),
            ],
            1
          ),
        ],
        1
      ),
    ],
    1
  )
}
var staticRenderFns = []
render._withStripped = true

export { render, staticRenderFns }
